Title.Language: Litany of the Bishops in the Absence of a Bishop

Comment.Language: In the absence of a metropolitan or bishop.

Remember, O Lord, the other orthodox bishops in all placesâ€”

Twbh e~jen nenio] n~e~pickopoc n~oryodoxoc etqen mai niben n~te ]oikoumen/ t/rc: nem nih/goumenoc nem nip~recbuteroc nem nidiakwn: nem p~tagma t/rf n~te ]ekkl/cia: hina n~te Pi,~rictoc Pennou] a~reh e~rwou e~bolha pethwou niben: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.

Pray for our fathers the orthodox bishops in every place of the whole world, and the hegumens, the priests, the deacons, and every order of the Church, that Christ our God may keep them from every evil, and forgive us our sins.
